content:
To improve the answer to the question, “If you didn’t work on this project, what would you work on instead?” the following could be added:
While we would continue to organize small community events across the country, we recognize that these events have limitations in terms of reach and impact. Without the opportunity to offer a larger, high-quality event like Ethereum Mexico, we would miss out on the chance to bring together builders, developers, and enthusiasts from across Mexico to network, collaborate, and share knowledge. We believe that Ethereum Mexico is a unique opportunity to create a lasting impact on the Ethereum ecosystem in Mexico, and without it, we would be limited in our ability to contribute to the growth and development of the ecosystem. Therefore, we are fully committed to making Ethereum Mexico a success and believe that it is the best use of our time and resources.
